## S & P

```{r}
library(quantmod)

start <- as.Date("2008-01-01")
end <- as.Date("2018-12-01")

getSymbols("^GSPC", src = "yahoo", from = start, to = end)
class(GSPC)
head(GSPC)
```

```{r}
library(magrittr)

stocks <- as.xts(data.frame(GSPC = GSPC[, "GSPC.Close"]))

stock_return = apply(stocks, 1, function(x) {x[,1] / x[1,]}) %>%
```
